results.title: Functional anatomy of the hand (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Dissection of a human hand and arm shows the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of hand and individual fingers and presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.
results.description: Dissection of a human hand and arm shows the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of hand and individual fingers and presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.

results.title: Function of digestion (TEFC)
results.brief_description: A study of the digestive organs and the theory of digestion. Filmed experiments on rabbits discount the mechanical hypotheses of digestion and the effect of saliva on bread, changing starch to glucose, demonstrates the action of digestive enzymes. The wall of the intestine is also shown.

results.title: Fun radio!
results.brief_description: A casual glance at the Australian summer weekend. A troupe of pop singers is greeted at the airport by a large crowd. In the suburbs people are seen at their homes. Life in Melbourne is seen as a great religious festival, complete with rituals, taboos and minor deities.

results.title: Fun on foot
results.creator_credit: National Hiking and Ski Touring Association, I.M.S., Bjorn Kjellstrom, Helene Huculak, Paul Franklin, Jim Harmon and John King
results.brief_description: A concept montage film on feet in action. From bush-walking to running to skipping and dancing - a tribute to feet and where they’re going. Produced in support of the Fun on Foot program.

results.title: Fun in Acapulco
results.creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Hal B Wallis and Richard Thorpe
results.brief_description: While in Acapulco, Elvis is pretty busy employed as a boat hand, lifeguard, and singer. He’s managed to capture the attention of a few of the local beauties (Ursula Andress, Elsa Cardenas), which fills in most of the spare time he has. He harbours a secret fear of heights however, after a fatal mishap during his career as a trapeze catcher leaves him shaken. Love manage to inspires him to overcome his fear of heights in the most public way possible - diving off a 136 foot cliff. Features the following songs: “Bossa Nova baby”, “You can’t say no in Acapulco”.

results.title: Fun for all
results.brief_description: Car Crazy: On an airstrip at Abbotsford, near Vancouver, young hot-rodders indulge their speed craze with the approval of policemen. Trappers at Play: The Pas, in northern Manitoba, stages the annual Trappers’ Festival. Lumberjack’s Picnic: Vancouver Island forestry champions compete and compare know-how.
